name: Ships 2017
description: Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea. Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: At least 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: Intel i5 3500k Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: At least 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The new fix  Go to opshion then graphics and trun them all to medium and then you game will load and this fixes when you get stuck on loading screen.
